input: A stunning architectural photo of a historic building: intricate details, vibrant colors, and warm lighting, set against a bustling city background, evoking grandeur
output: Dramatic sun sets behind the majestic facade of a historic Gothic Revival church, with stained glass windows blazing hues of crimson and amber as the sky transforms into a kaleidoscope of pinks and purples. Warm golden light pours through the intricate stone carvings, highlighting the ornate details in sharp relief against the dark city backdrop, creating striking contrast between ancient grandeur and modern urbanity.
